text: @RobertJenrick Robert, the Government‘s credibility is seriously undermined, and exhortations to follow COVID-19 rules will carry no authority while Cummings remains in post.  For the sake of the country, he needs to go - regardless of the veracity (or otherwise) of his statement today.
